binding.response:
let result = golem:order-exports/api.{get}();
match result {  some(x) => {status: 200u64, body: ok(x)}, none => {status: 404u64, body: ok({message: "not found"})} }

let result = golem:order-exports/api.{ship-order}();
match result {  ok(_) => {status: 200u64, body: ok({message: "order shipped"})}, err(x) => {status: 400u64, body: err({error: x})} }

let result = golem:order-exports/api.{cancel-order}();
match result {  ok(_) => {status: 200u64, body: ok({message: "order cancelled"})}, err(x) => {status: 400u64, body: err({error: x})} }

let result = golem:order-exports/api.{update-billing-address}(request.body);
match result {  ok(_) => {status: 200u64, body: ok({message: "address set"})}, err(x) => {status: 400u64, body: err({error: x})} }

let result = golem:order-exports/api.{update-shipping-address}(request.body);
match result {  ok(_) => {status: 200u64, body: ok({message: "address set"})}, err(x) => {status: 400u64, body: err({error: x})} }

let result = golem:order-exports/api.{remove-item}(request.path.product-id);
match result {  ok(_) => {status: 200u64, body: ok({message: "item removed"})}, err(x) => {status: 400u64, body: err({error: x})} }
